editor.title: CROSSHAIR EDITOR
editor.subtitle: Advanced visual editor for creating perfect crosshairs

howTo.title: HOW TO USE
howTo.subtitle: Import crosshairs to VALORANT in 4 simple steps

steps.desc1: Navigate to the Crosshairs page and browse through our collection of professional player configurations.
steps.desc2: Click the COPY button on any crosshair card. The code will be copied to your clipboard.
steps.desc3: Launch VALORANT and press ESC to open the menu. Navigate to Settings → Crosshair.
steps.desc4: Click on Crosshair Profile and select Import Profile. Paste the code and press Import.
steps.desc5: Test your new crosshair in the Practice Range and make adjustments as needed.
